GraphicView Class Reference

 GraphicView (QWidget *parent=0)

Detailed Description

GraphicView class implements a 3D representation of items from a model.

GraphicView provides a model/view implementation of a 3D view. Implements the interfaces defined by the QAbstractItemView class to allow it to display data provided by models derived from the QAbstractItemModel class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

GraphicView::GraphicView ( QWidget *  parent = 0  ) 

Creates a new GraphicView with a parerent for the model data 3D representation.

Use setModel() to set the model.
